title: Baan Biik Woora Woora Water, Land and Sky
creator_credit: Mick Harding, Sam Mapplebeck and Sam Barnes
credit_line:
(Yowong-Illam-Baluk and Nattarak Baluk clans of the Taungurung people)

5-channel video, stereo audio

Duration: 60 minutes
brief_description: This moving image artwork celebrates the water,land and sky. It showcases bright, intricate elements of First Nations artist Mick Harding’s iconic south-eastern geometric patterns. Paired with an original soundscape, Harding’s animated creation brings to life the vibrant sounds and movements of Country and native wildlife.
title_for_label: Baan Biik Woora Woora Water, Land and Sky
creator_credit_for_label: Mick Harding, Sam Mapplebeck and Sam Barnes
description:
This moving image artwork celebrates the water,land and sky. It showcases bright, intricate elements of First Nations artist Mick Harding’s iconic south-eastern geometric patterns. Paired with an original soundscape, Harding’s animated creation brings to life the vibrant sounds and movements of Country and native wildlife.

Background art: Mitchil Harding

Song: Mick Harding, Mitchil Harding and Corey Harding

Animator: Jackson Cook

Sound designer: Hamish Keen

Producer: Sam Barnes
